overview: She wanders the streets of East Los Angeles lost in the city of Angels looking for a sign in the dark but she sees the light. Is it a dream? She is compelled to follow the neon lights, she goes to nothingness. The second release of the on going project of 'The Neon Series' that follows the first short 'Belladonna'.
tagline: She isn't sure of her destination. She is lost, she's like L.A.
title: Elle est comme LA
